title: Congress suggests will oppose ordinance taking away AAP govt powers in Delhi
selftext: AAP linked this to its participation in Oppn unity meeting. No explicit promise, but Cong says: “Have always fought Modi govt assaults on states... no question of not opposing it”
comments: Good. Opposition needs to unite itself to fight against BJP.
